test.instr: (:ins (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X yellow) (sort Y desk))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X yellow) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X red) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X white))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X airconditioner))) )
test.nl: The door of the cupboard is opened. There is a bottle which is yellow on the desk. Put a bottle which is yellow on the microwave. Put the blue book in the microwave. Put the red can on the cupboard. Put down the white remotecontrol. Close the cupboard. Go to the airconditioner.
